column1: The '''Standard of Elendil''' was a standard that [[Aragorn|Aragorn Elessar]] bore on the Paths of the Dead
column2: made by [[Arwen]].<ref>{{RK|V2}}</ref>  It had a black field
column3: with seven stars wrought of gems
column4: a [[White Tree of Gondor|white tree]] for [[Gondor]]
column5: and a crown wrought of ''[[mithril]]'' and gold.  These were the signs of the house of [[Elendil]]
column6: which Aragorn unfurled at the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]].<ref>{{RK|V6}}</ref>
